Posts.Content: tfriend4ever wrote: It's 5 weeks now that my mom was diagnosed with BC. We just found out today that it is hormonal positive and she will be starting her therapy next Wednesday. She has had 21 litres of fluid drained from her abdominÂ in the last month and is due to have another 6 litres taken out in the next day or so. She is now lethargic, vomiting and down to approx 95lbs (originally around 130) and to think 2 months ago she was perfectly healthy. Have many of you dealt with the belly fluid??? I had never heard of it until just recently. I'm starting to loose my hope that she's going to get through this.... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Ascites tfriend4ever suz45
